original_text: Many people will say that they have come on my behalf. They will say, “I am the Messiah!” and they will deceive many people.
korean_text: 많은 사람이 내 이름으로 와서 이르되 내가 그라 하여 많은 사람을 미혹하리라

sentences.original_text: that they have come on my behalf
and they will deceive many people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 많은 사람들을 속일 것입니다
